channel.name: systems gauges PHI attitude gyrocompass operative

switch.name: systems/gauges/PHI/attitude/gyrocompass-on
switch.test: systems/electric/bus[1]/gyrocompass/fuse == 1 systems/electric/bus[1]/gyrocompass/sw == 1 systems/electric/bus[1]/V GE 18.0 systems/electric/inv-primary/V GT 110.0

channel.name: systems gauges PHI calculate doppler speed

switch.name: systems/gauges/PHI/doppler/is-correct-asset
switch.test: attitude/pitch-rad GE -0.69 attitude/pitch-rad LE 0.69 attitude/roll-rad GE -0.69 attitude/roll-rad LE 0.69

channel.name: systems gauges PHI calculate speed and space
systems gauges PHI indicator set dist and phi
systems gauges PHI doppler pannel switch
